title: Riesling pork pies (Rieslingspaschteit)
description: This is a traditional Luxembourg dish – a wonderful meat pie into which a fragrant Riesling jelly is poured and left to set. We were very keen to track down this recipe, as when Dave worked in Luxembourg for a couple of years a while back, he used to eat one of these pies for his lunch every day.
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
